frontmatter.title: Contour
frontmatter.subtitle: Collaborative and visual infrastructure as design for Contour
frontmatter.howItWorksDetails: Builds upon the basic Kubernetes resource and controller concepts, but includes domain-specific knowledge to automate the entire lifecycle of Contour.
featureList: Supports dynamic configuration updates out of the box while maintaining a lightweight profile.
Introduces a new ingress API (HTTPProxy) which is implemented via a Custom Resource Definition (CRD).
Solves shortcomings in the original design.
